```{r}
d <- mtcars[1:3, 1:3]
d[2, 3] <- cell_spec(d[2, 3],
  format = "tblr",
  underline = TRUE,
  background = "pink",
  escape = FALSE,
  font_size = 20)

kbl(d,
  format = "latex",
  tabular = "tblr",
  escape = FALSE,
  caption = "Blah blah") |>

  row_spec(
    row = c(1, 3),
    background = "pink",
    color = "blue",
    bold = TRUE,
    italic = TRUE,
    strikeout = FALSE,
    align = "c") |>

  column_spec(
    1:2,
    background = "yellow",
    color = "red",
    monospace = TRUE,
    strikeout = TRUE,
    width = c("4cm", "6cm"),
    border_left = TRUE)
```
